review: Absolutely love it, I recommend it!! Very easy to navigate, very happy with it
author: Heather Ellis

review: I haven't seen any tv programs listed that I have ever heard of. And haven't really checked out much else.  I need to get AT&R; uverse  so it doesn't stop and start.  I had to have a friend come in and get it going.  We shall see.
author: Sharon Jarding

review: Love the UX of the menu. So easy to use and much better option than Chromecast (I have both).
author: APL418

review: It's not bad, could have a few options added like Hulu or Google but I like it.
author: Adrien Wilhite

review: The Fire TV Stick is great. The only unpleasant surprise was the fact that nearly anything we want to watch costs money. I guess there really is no such thing as a free lunch!
author: Charles Ota Heller "Charles O. Heller"

review: Easy set up smooth operation. Lots of choices but some only in SD.
author: rich petersen

review: Does a great job streaming with our very slow internet.  Like it so well I bought a second one. Wish it had the CBS app available.
author: Vicky Young

review: I got it all setup and able to connect it. I have a DSL connection because of work and it's connection speed is too low so it will not stream video
author: Sue

review: Love my fir stick. How did I live with out?
author: TimHBTR54
